Notes: Limited to one for each player
Can be infiltrated to reset the superweapon's timer

rows: Type: Support SuperweaponRecharge time: 6:30Teleports friendly vehicles and naval vessels (except epic units) around the battlefieldLeft-click icon then left-click on vehicles to teleport, then left-click on target location
